title: Great for Buisness travel, very close to Trade and Exhibition Centres.
text:
Apron entering the hotel lobby you instantly get the feeling of grandeur. The staff are very friendly and welcoming. I stayed in a Horizon Club room, enjoyed their happy hour complementary food and drinks. The gym is very large and well equipped. The indoor hotel pool is amazing. Hotel is close to Slik Market, upmarket shopping in the mall below, many restaurants close by. The hotel morning buffet caters for Asian and Western Cuisines. Staff are all very helpful. Enjoyed my stay, will be back.
Room Tip: Choose Horizon Club for club lounge, happy hour and amazing service. See more room tips
